column1: Uchi////One of the best izakaya restaurants that I have ever been too...be prepared to wait a long time or make reservations well in advance because they only open from 5-10pm. They are limited quantity so late comers might not be able to taste certain items
column2: this is a must try for Japanese food lovers!!!!! Sooooo fresh and amazingly tasty
column3: words can't describe how awesome the food was...my favorite was the hamachi and the machi cure
column4: it's pricy here but well worth also save room for their house special fried milk
